Namespace Data.IO.Tools

Classes

ConvertType

Provides a mapping from SQL to System types, and possibly more in the future.

ConvertValue

Very fast string to int, long, float, double, bool conversion which also handles formatted numbers (separators, percent, currency).

Optimizations aim at preventing calls to TryParse as early as possible by performing sanity checks on the string. These speed-ups were battle-tested with a huge CSV file of ~45,000 rows times 45 columns. It made CSV reading 3-4 times faster compared to brute-force TryParse each type one after another.

IndentStringBuilder

Wrapper for StringBuilder that makes it easy to create indent formatted text files, like scripts.

Has methods for appending string[] so it gets more comfortable to add many smaller strings, example: builder.AppendIndented(new [] {$"{this}", " appends ", "several", " strings", " at ", "once", dot});

OpenBlock and CloseBlock add lines with curly brackets and increment/decrement indentation.

You can also use the original StringBuilder methods without indentation through this wrapper.

UnityPath

Makes dealing with Unity paths easier.

Enums

PathRoot

Specifiy root paths for UnityPath methods.
